content: If anyone is interested in a quick overview of NLM Questionnaire-related open-source tools, I just scheduled a session in Salon 6 at 1:00. I will cover the LHC-Forms Questionnaire-renderer, the LHC Form Builder, the SMART on FHIR SDC App, the UCUM-LHC JavaScript library, the UCUM web API, and the fhirpath.js FHIRPath library.

Links from the breakout session:

  • LHC-Forms (Questionnaire rendering widget):
    • Demo: https://lhcforms.nlm.nih.gov
    • Developer instructions: http://lhncbc.github.io/lforms/
  • SDC Questionnaire App: https://apps.smarthealthit.org/app/lforms-questionnaire-app
    • Open source at: https://github.com/lhncbc/lforms-fhir-app
  • LHC Form Builder: https://lhcformbuilder.nlm.nih.gov/
    • Open source at: https://github.com/lhncbc/formbuilder-lhcforms
  • UCUM-LHC library (for UCUM validation & conversion: https://github.com/lhncbc/ucum-lhc
    • Demo and batch validation at: https://ucum.nlm.nih.gov/ucum-lhc/demo.html
  • UCUM web API: https://ucum.nlm.nih.gov/ucum-service.html
  • fhirpath.js (npm package "fhirpath"): https://github.com/HL7/fhirpath.js/
    • Demo at: https://hl7.github.io/fhirpath.js/

Presentation notes: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1jcHKssXOnFB--Dsliwxww92LYD_DTkkh
